name: Blade
description: You are a warrior, trained in the art of steel and combat. Whether a knight, mercenary, or duelist, you solve problems with your weapon and your courage. You stand between your allies and danger.
playstyle: Direct combat, protecting allies, facing threats head-on. You excel in melee combat and can take hits that would down others.

name: Shadow
description: You are a rogue, scout, or infiltrator. You rely on stealth, precision, and cunning rather than brute force. You strike from the darkness, exploit weaknesses, and vanish before the enemy knows you were there.
playstyle: Stealth, ambush tactics, scouting. You excel at avoiding direct confrontation and striking when it matters most.

name: Mystic
description: You are a practitioner of the arcane or divine arts. You wield powers beyond mortal understandingâ€”rituals, wards, visions, and the manipulation of unseen forces. Your mind is your weapon.
playstyle: Magic, problem-solving, support. You excel at manipulating the environment, buffing allies, and wielding supernatural power.
